experience: You and Denise both know Scott Kwait, Trent Humbert, and 6 others

The compliance division at Strategic Legal Solutions offers integrated compliance solutions focusing on people, process, and technology. Our solutions focus on meeting regulatory and business needs. Strategic's compliance division also provides nationwide staffing service to compliance professionals on temporary and permanent basis.

Responsible for full life-cycle recruitment of entry to senior level compliance professionals across the United States in permanent and contract positions.Compliance areas covered include: Alternative investments, AML/BSA /KYC/ OFAC, Asset Management, Bank regulations, Branch examinations, Capital Markets, Commodities, Control Room, Derivatives, Dodd-Frank, EDD, Equities, Fair lending, Fixed Income (Credit, FX, Interest rates, and Treasury), Futures/OTC/Swaps, Investment advisory, Marketing and Advertising review, Monitoring and testing, Privacy, Private wealth management, regulatory examination/inquiries, SOX, and surveillance.
